data.name: CallToActionText
data.value: If you liked the experience please rate and leave a review. Also subscribe to my youtube channel.

data.name: DescriptionText
data.value: This is a short description of the app

data.name: ExplanationParagraph1Text
data.value: Almost twenty years ago, psychologist Arthur Aron and colleagues conducted research to explore whether it was possible to help strangers create closeness and develop a relationship by asking a series of specific personal questions.

data.name: ExplanationParagraph2Text
data.value: The idea is that mutual vulnerability through self-disclosure, fosters closeness and has an impact of the process of building a relationship. When we allow ourselves to be vulnerable with another person it fosters closeness, “sustained, escalating, reciprocal, personal self-disclosure” is fundamental to the development of a close relationship.

data.name: ExplanationParagraph3Text
data.value: The 36 questions are broken up into three sets, with a gradual increase in intensity of self-disclosure.

data.name: ThankYouText
data.value: Thank you for using the app. I hope you and your partner got to meet each other better.
